class.name: AudioStreamCsoundChannel
class.description: Audio stream that can be used to get the output of numbered Csound channels.

method.name: csound_layout_changed
method.description: Method to notify AudioStreamCsoundChannel when Csound layout has changed. This is used internally to update the property list.

method.name: get_csound_name
method.description: Gets the name of the Csound instance that should be used to get the channel audio.

method.name: get_stream_name
method.description: The name assigned to this audio stream. Unused by the engine.

method.name: set_csound_name
method.description: Gets the [param name] of the Csound instance that should be used to get the channel audio.

members.member: The Csound channel number that should be used to send the Audio Bus left channel.
The Csound channel number that should be used to send the Audio Bus right channel.
